Minutes of Council held at Ft. George regarding land on Kattskill granted to A. Prevoost
Minutes of Council held at Ft. George regarding land on Kattskill granted to A. Prevoost
Council members were Messrs. Horfmander, Smiths, Watts, Walton, Delancey, Apthorpe, Reade, and Morris.
